issues.description: In the problem statement under Part 2, the text says that each PersonController method takes a `Consumer<List<Note>>` parameter, but both the template and solution use `Consumer<List<Person>>`. This copy-paste error in the described generic type could briefly mislead students about the correct method signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement text to refer to `Consumer<List<Person>>` instead of `Consumer<List<Note>>` for the PersonController methods.
